inputs.remark: 缺少 V4 (one year follow up)。

logic_summary: Added 'Final Appointment' to ordered_list to reflect the 1-year follow-up mentioned in the text and follow-up plan.
Added V4 to expected_interpretations_by_visit to capture the 1-year outcome described in section 47.6.

value.rationale_short: To monitor device usage, symptom severity, and social functioning at 1 year.

value.collective_interpretation: At the 1-year final appointment, the patient reported significant progress with symptoms and social functioning, despite ongoing tolerance issues.

tests.name: Final Appointment
tests.result_summary: Able to participate in activities previously impossible (supermarket, dentist, optician, GP). Used sound generators to manage situations and gain control. Reported satisfaction with devices and no preferred program.
